title: Pakistan’s tallest man Naseer Soomro passes away in Shikarpur - Pakistan - DAWN.COM
content:
KARACHI: Naseer Soomro, Pakistan’s tallest man, passed away in Shikarpur after a protracted illness. He was 55.

His funeral prayers will be offered in Shikarpur on Tuesday (today).

According to media reports, the 7-foot 9-inch tall man was considered one of the tallest people in the world, as he was at least three-foot taller than ordinary people.

His extraordinary height brought him national and international recognition, making Pakistan famous on a global stage. In recognition of his status, the government had offered him a job with the national flag carrier, Pakistan International Airlines.

Meanwhile, Sindh Chief Minister Murad Ali Shah expressed deep sorrow over the passing of Naseer Soomro.

Published in Dawn, March 18th, 2025
